messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Aging Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I m 48, I ll be almost 50 later this month. Carolyn
messages.messageBody:
I'm 48, I'll be "almost 50" later this month.

Carolyn

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Aging Unschoolers
messages.messageBody:
<<Well, I'm turning 41. Forty MIGHT have been traumatic, except that my
Beloved Patrner distracted me with a surprise party, a trip to London, and
many gifts. I suggested she may need to keep distracting me...except we
bought a house and have no money for exciting trips this year. I think I'll
just have to shake it off.>>

What a wonderful celebration--sounds like you'll always have great memories of a milestone birthday. Hope you will have a lovely birthday closer to home.

Ann



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Aging Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Here s the secret to feeling young - marry someone older . I m 42, Craig is 49. I m dreading his 50th way more than any birthday I ve ever had. I love the
messages.messageBody:
Here's the secret to feeling young - marry someone older <vbg>.

I'm 42, Craig is 49. I'm dreading his 50th way more than any birthday I've
ever had.

I love the 40's EXCEPT - right at 40, lots of physical things got
problematic. It made getting older feel a bit more obvious.

Paula

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Aging Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... I got grey hairs at 30. Three years further on there are still the same amount. Weird. Now I m waiting for the wrinkles :( Shyrley PS My hair is usually
messages.messageBody:
kayb85 wrote:

> I'll be 30 in 2 more months. This past week I noticed that I have a
> few streaks of gray here and there...
> Sheila
>

I got grey hairs at 30. Three years further on there are still the same
amount. Weird. Now I'm waiting for the wrinkles :(

Shyrley

PS My hair is usually dyed pink or red or purple. Hides the grey a treat
:)

Sheila

messages.subject: Re: Aging Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 01/06/2002 6:48:36 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Well, I m turning 41.  Forty MIGHT have been traumatic, except that my Beloved Patrner
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 01/06/2002 6:48:36 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> <<Seriously...how old ARE people? I'm feeling VERY old this week.
>
> Kathryn, who has a birthday coming up soon, is finding it a disturbing one,
> and is annoyed with herself for finding it disturbing>>
>
> Kathryn,
>
> It's okay to find it disturbing, really!! I've had some of those birthdays,
> and I'm realizing that it's just part of my life to have birthdays are big
> marker points for me. They bring up lots of "stuff."
>
> Just cruising toward 44.
>
> Ann
>
>
>

Well, I'm turning 41. Forty MIGHT have been traumatic, except that my
Beloved Patrner distracted me with a surprise party, a trip to London, and
many gifts. I suggested she may need to keep distracting me...except we
bought a house and have no money for exciting trips this year. I think I'll
just have to shake it off.

Kathryn
